Description: Connector to work with custom entity types in Dynamics.
Name: Microsoft Dynamics CRM Custom Object

Methods.Name: Get Custom Entity Record
Methods.Description: Gets a single custom entity record by ID.

Methods.Name: List New Custom Entity Records
Methods.Description: Lists custom entity records created since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Updated Custom Entity Records
Methods.Description: Lists custom entity records created or modified since the last run.

Methods.Name: Delete Custom Entity Record
Methods.Description: Deletes a single custom entity record by ID.

Methods.Name: Update Custom Entity Record
Methods.Description: Updates an existing custom entity record.

Methods.Name: Get First Custom Entity Record
Methods.Description: Gets the first custom entity record matching some criteria.

Methods.Name: List Upd. Cust. Ent. Records (incremental)
Methods.Description: Lists custom entity records created or modified since the last run - in pre-set increments.

Methods.Name: Create Custom Entity Record
Methods.Description: Creates a new custom entity record.

Methods.Name: List Entity Types
Methods.Description: Lists the entity types associated with this account.

Methods.Name: Get Entity Type
Methods.Description: Gets the entity type(s) associated with a specified entity set.

Methods.Name: List Entity Sets
Methods.Description: Lists the entity sets associated with this account.
